item.title: An R User Chooses a Python IDE
item.description: Jupyter Notebooks Rodeo Spyder Text Editor (e.g. Sublime) PyCharm Final Thoughts Yes, this is a post about IDEs. Let the name-calling begin! No, no, I don’t intend to insult or incite any ill-will towards any person or project. This purpose of this post is to give other people who are familiar working with R, some insight into how a fellow R user has evaluated and experienced picking an IDE for programming Python.
